name: Compare Versions
func:
import os


file = '/home/pi/shared2/ui/data/update.log'
url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OpenScanEu/OpenScan/master/update_mini.log'
try:
    os.remove(file)
except OSError:
    pass
os.system('wget -O'+file+' '+url+' >/dev/null 2>&1')


with open("/home/pi/shared2/ui/data/update.log", "r") as file:
    versionserver=str(file.read())[:16]
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentversion.log", "r") as file:
    versionpi=str(file.read())[:16]

msg['payload']="you are up to date"

if versionpi!=versionserver:
    file="/home/pi/.node-red/flows_raspberrypi_download.json"
    url="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OpenScanEu/OpenScan/master/update_mini.json"
    try:
        os.remove(file)
    except OSError:
        pass
    os.system('wget -O'+file+' '+url+' >/dev/null 2>&1')

    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentserverversion.log", "w") as file:
        file.write(versionserver)
    os.rename("/home/pi/.node-red/flows_raspberrypi_download.json","/home/pi/shared2/ui/data/old_flows/"+versionserver+".json")
    msg['payload']="new updates available"

return msg

    newversion=file.read()
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/manual_en.log", "r") as file:
    oldversion=file.read()

if oldversion==newversion:
    return
    
file = '/home/pi/shared2/ui/data/Manual_en.pdf'
url = ' https://github.com/OpenScanEu/OpenScan/raw/master/Manual_en.pdf'
try:
    os.remove(file)
except OSError:
    pass
os.system('wget -q -O'+file+url)
statinfo=os.stat(file)
if(os.path.exists(file)==False) or statinfo.st_size==0:

name: download files
func:
import os.path
import os
# Download background

def download(file,url):
    if(os.path.exists(file)==False):
        try:
            os.system('wget -O'+file+' '+url+' >/dev/null 2>&1')
        except:
            pass
        return
    statinfo=os.stat(file)
    if(statinfo.st_size==0):
        try:
            os.system('wget -O'+file+url+' >/dev/null 2>&1')
        except:
            pass        
        return

file = '/home/pi/shared2/ui/data/logosmall.jpg'
url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OpenScanEu/OpenScan/master/temp/Logosmall.jpg'
download(file,url)

file = '/home/pi/shared2/ui/data/Manual_en.pdf'
url = ' https://github.com/OpenScanEu/OpenScan/raw/master/Manual_en.pdf'
download(file,url)

file = '/home/pi/shared2/ui/data/bmc-new-btn-logo.svg'
url = 'https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/buttons/bmc-new-btn-logo.svg'
download(file,url)

file = '/home/pi/.node-red/settings_openscan_mini.js'
url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OpenScanEu/OpenScan/master/settings_mini.js'
download(file,url)

file = '/home/pi/.node-red/settings_openscan.js'

import os.path

def new_path(path):
    if(os.path.exists(path)==False):
        os.mkdir(path)

name: blink
func:
from time import sleep
import RPi.GPIO as GPIO

sleeptime = 0.05

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_ringlight1.log", "r") as file:
    ringlightpin1=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_ringlight2.log", "r") as file:
    ringlightpin2=int(file.read())

GPIO.setwarnings(False)
GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
GPIO.setup(ringlightpin1, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.setup(ringlightpin2, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.output(ringlightpin2, GPIO.LOW)

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/ringlightstatus1.log", "w") as file:
    file.write("off")
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/ringlightstatus2.log", "w") as file:
    file.write("off")

for x in range(10):
    GPIO.output(ringlightpin1, GPIO.HIGH)
    sleep(sleeptime)
    GPIO.output(ringlightpin1, GPIO.LOW)
    sleep(sleeptime)
msg['payload']="off"
return msg

import os.path
from time import sleep

def new_file(filepath,content):
    if os.path.isfile(filepath):
        pass
    else:
        with open(filepath, "w") as file:
            file.write(content)

name: check ip address
func:
import socket
import subprocess

routing = subprocess.check_output("route | grep '^default' | grep -o '[^ ]*$'", shell=True)
if routing=="wlan0\n":
    routing="Wifi"
elif routing=="eth0\n":
    routing="Ethernet"
elif routing=="eth0\nwlan0\n" or routing=="wlan0\neth0\n":
    routing="Ethernet+Wifi"
else:
    routing="none"


testIP = "8.8.8.8"
s = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_DGRAM)
s.connect((testIP, 0))
ipaddr = s.getsockname()[0]
host = socket.gethostname()



msg['routing']=routing
msg['ip']=ipaddr
msg['hostname']=host

return msg

msg['payload']="This is a free piece of software and it is provided 'as is', without any warranty. There might be functions that need a connection to the internet: By pressing 'GET FEATURES' you agree that the shown preview image will be transfered, stored and processed via SFTP. By pressing 'UPLOAD FILES&GET FEEDBACK' you agree, that the following data will be transmitted, stored and processed via SFTP to my (Thomas Megel, OpenScan, Halle, Germany) server: three compressed images of the chosen photo-set, routine parameters, email address, IP address. I will use those information to create a detailed feedback on the image quality/scan settings and send a response to the given email address. The email address and IP will be deleted after 7 days. The images and routine parameters might be used for further experiments (e.g. machine learning to automate the process). If you have any questions you can contact me at info@openscan.eu. The connection used, is a direct, encrypted line between your device and my server - no AWS, no Google analytics, no Facebook whatsoever ... THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED 'AS IS' WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS OR ANYONE DISTRIBUTING THE SOFTWARE BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE"
return msg

name: TT left
func:
from time import sleep
import RPi.GPIO as GPIO
GPIO.setwarnings(False)

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_turntable_step.log", "r") as file:
    STEP=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_turntable_dir.log", "r") as file:
    DIR=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_stepsperrotation.log", "r") as file:
    step_count=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_delay.log", "r") as file:
    delaytt=float(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_angle.log", "r") as file:
    angle=float(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_accramp.log", "r") as file:
    ramp=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_acc.log", "r") as file:
    acc=ramp*float(file.read())    


step_count=int(step_count*angle/360)

GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
GPIO.setup(DIR, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.setup(STEP, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.output(DIR, 0)
delay=delaytt

for x in range(step_count):
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.HIGH)
    if x<=ramp and x<=step_count/2:
        delay=delaytt+(ramp-x)*delaytt/acc
    elif step_count-x<=ramp and x>step_count/2:
        delay=delaytt+(ramp-step_count+x)*delaytt/acc
    sleep(delay)
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.LOW)
    sleep(delay)
GPIO.cleanup()

return msg

name: TT right
func:
from time import sleep
import RPi.GPIO as GPIO
GPIO.setwarnings(False)

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_turntable_step.log", "r") as file:
    STEP=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_turntable_dir.log", "r") as file:
    DIR=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_stepsperrotation.log", "r") as file:
    step_count=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_delay.log", "r") as file:
    delaytt=float(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_angle.log", "r") as file:
    angle=float(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_accramp.log", "r") as file:
    ramp=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_acc.log", "r") as file:
    acc=ramp*float(file.read())    

step_count=int(step_count*angle/360)

GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
GPIO.setup(DIR, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.setup(STEP, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.output(DIR, 1)
delay=delaytt

for x in range(step_count):
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.HIGH)
    if x<=ramp and x<=step_count/2:
        delay=delaytt+(ramp-x)*delaytt/acc
    elif step_count-x<=ramp and x>step_count/2:
        delay=delaytt+(ramp-step_count+x)*delaytt/acc
    sleep(delay)
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.LOW)
    sleep(delay)
GPIO.cleanup()

return msg

name: Rotor left
func:
from time import sleep
import RPi.GPIO as GPIO
GPIO.setwarnings(False)

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_rotor_step.log", "r") as file:
    STEP=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_rotor_dir.log", "r") as file:
    DIR=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_stepsperrotation.log", "r") as file:
    step_count=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_delay.log", "r") as file:
    delaytt=float(file.read())

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_angle.log", "r") as file:
    angle=float(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_accramp.log", "r") as file:
    ramp=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_acc.log", "r") as file:
    acc=ramp*float(file.read())   

step_count=int(step_count*angle/360)

GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
GPIO.setup(DIR, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.setup(STEP, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.output(DIR, 0)

for x in range(step_count):
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.HIGH)
    if x<=ramp and x<=step_count/2:
        delay=delaytt+(ramp-x)*delaytt/acc
    elif step_count-x<=ramp and x>step_count/2:
        delay=delaytt+(ramp-step_count+x)*delaytt/acc
    sleep(delay)
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.LOW)
    sleep(delay)
GPIO.cleanup()

return msg

func:
from time import sleep
import RPi.GPIO as GPIO
GPIO.setwarnings(False)

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_rotor_step.log", "r") as file:
    STEP=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_rotor_dir.log", "r") as file:
    DIR=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_stepsperrotation.log", "r") as file:
    step_count=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_delay.log", "r") as file:
    delaytt=float(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_angle.log", "r") as file:
    angle=float(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_accramp.log", "r") as file:
    ramp=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_acc.log", "r") as file:
    acc=ramp*float(file.read())   

step_count=int(step_count*angle/360)

GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
GPIO.setup(DIR, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.setup(STEP, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.output(DIR, 1)

for x in range(step_count):
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.HIGH)
    if x<=ramp and x<=step_count/2:
        delay=delaytt+(ramp-x)*delaytt/acc
    elif step_count-x<=ramp and x>step_count/2:
        delay=delaytt+(ramp-step_count+x)*delaytt/acc
    sleep(delay)
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.LOW)
    sleep(delay)
GPIO.cleanup()

return msg

name: timestamp pic file
Take Preview Shot
func:
import time
import picamera
from time import sleep
import subprocess
from PIL import Image

downscale=3

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentstatus_rpi.log", "r") as file:
    if file.read()=="creating zip file":
        return

if subprocess.check_output(["vcgencmd","get_camera"])[-2:-1]=="0":
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentstatus_rpi.log", "w") as file:
        file.write("no camera found")
    return

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentstatus_rpi.log", "r") as file:
    state=file.read()
    if state[:3]=="Pos":
        return

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentstatus_rpi.log", "w") as file:
        file.write("--READY--")

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/shutterspeed.log", "r") as file:
    shutterspeed=int(file.read())*100


with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/camera_resolution_x.log", "r") as file:
    resx=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/camera_resolution_y.log", "r") as file:
    resy=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentstatus_rpi.log", "r") as file:
    currentstatus=file.read()

def rotate(filepath):
    pass

def crop(filepath):
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/cropx.log", "r") as file:
        cropx=int(file.read())
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/cropy.log", "r") as file:
        cropy=int(file.read())    
    img = Image.open(filepath)
    width, height = img.size 

    left = width*cropy/100
    top = height*cropx/100
    right = width*(100-cropy)/100
    bottom = height*(100-cropx)/100
    img= img.crop((left,top,right,bottom))
    img.save(filepath)
    zoom=min(float(cropx)/50,float(cropy)/50)
    img = img.resize((int(float(1200-24*cropy)/(1-zoom)),int(float(900-18*cropx)/(1-zoom))))
    img  = img.transpose(Image.ROTATE_90)
    img.save('./shared2/ui/data/preview.jpg')
    img.close()


if currentstatus == "--READY--":
    with picamera.PiCamera() as camera:
        camera.iso = 100
        camera.brightness = 50
        camera.contrast = 0
        camera.resolution=(resx/downscale, resy/downscale)
        camera.exposure_compensation = 0 
        sleep(0.4)
        camera.awb_mode = 'auto'
        camera.exposure_mode = 'off'
        camera.shutter_speed = shutterspeed
        camera.capture("./shared2/ui/data/preview.jpg",quality=90)
        rotate("./shared2/ui/data/preview.jpg")
        crop("./shared2/ui/data/preview.jpg")
    return msg


return

from time import sleep
import RPi.GPIO as GPIO

sleep(1)

sleeptime = 0.05

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_ringlight1.log", "r") as file:
    ringlightpin1=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_ringlight2.log", "r") as file:
    ringlightpin2=int(file.read())

GPIO.setwarnings(False)
GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
GPIO.setup(ringlightpin1, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.setup(ringlightpin2, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.output(ringlightpin2, GPIO.LOW)

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/ringlightstatus1.log", "w") as file:
    file.write("off")
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/ringlightstatus2.log", "w") as file:
    file.write("off")

for x in range(10):
    GPIO.output(ringlightpin1, GPIO.HIGH)
    sleep(sleeptime)
    GPIO.output(ringlightpin1, GPIO.LOW)
    sleep(sleeptime)
msg['payload']="off"
return msg

import time
import picamera
from time import sleep
import subprocess
from PIL import Image

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/feedback_terms.log", "r") as file:
    terms=file.read()
if terms=="False":
    msg['payload']="Please read and agree to the Terms of Use (See Settings Menu) before you can use this function"
    return None,msg

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentstatus_rpi.log", "r") as file:
    state=file.read()
    if state[:3]=="Pos":
        return

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentstatus_rpi.log", "w") as file:
    file.write("initalizing")

if subprocess.check_output(["vcgencmd","get_camera"])[-2:-1]=="0":
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentstatus_rpi.log", "w") as file:
        file.write("no camera found")
    return

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/shutterspeed.log", "r") as file:
    shutterspeed=int(file.read())*100
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/camera_resolution_x.log", "r") as file:
    resx=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/camera_resolution_y.log", "r") as file:
    resy=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentstatus_rpi.log", "r") as file:
    currentstatus=file.read()

def crop(filepath):
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/cropx.log", "r") as file:
        cropx=int(file.read())
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/cropy.log", "r") as file:
        cropy=int(file.read())    
    img = Image.open(filepath)
    width, height = img.size 

    left = width*cropx/100
    top = height*cropy/100
    right = width*(100-cropx)/100
    bottom = height*(100-cropy)/100
    img= img.crop((left,top,right,bottom))
    img.save(filepath)
    zoom=min(float(cropx)/50,float(cropy)/50)
    #img = img.resize((int(float(600-12*cropx)/(1-zoom)), int(float(450-9*cropy)/(1-zoom))))
    img = img.resize((int(float(1800-36*cropx)/(1-zoom)), int(float(1350-27*cropy)/(1-zoom))))
    img  = img.transpose(Image.ROTATE_90)
    img.save('./shared2/ui/data/preview.jpg')
    img.close()

sleep(0.2)

with picamera.PiCamera() as camera:
    camera.iso = 100
    camera.brightness = 50
    camera.contrast = 0
    camera.resolution=(resx, resy)
    camera.exposure_compensation = 0 
    sleep(0.4)
    camera.awb_mode = 'auto'
    camera.exposure_mode = 'off'
    camera.shutter_speed = shutterspeed
    camera.capture("./shared2/ui/data/preview.jpg",quality=90)
    crop("./shared2/ui/data/preview.jpg")
return msg

name: features
func:
import os
import os
from PIL import Image
import uuid

from time import sleep
repeats=4
delay=3

filepath="/home/pi/shared2/ui/data/preview.jpg"

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/feedback_terms.log", "r") as file:
    terms=file.read()

key=uuid.uuid4().hex[:30].replace('0','X').replace('O','Y')


pw="MKN3iOE4u9qICzHzBmjwuWNt8UD62aP8uPxcOqsrwramqrMcoPJd7dJLz44B4VGRUOKk9W5C4viKrrINagKxvmrLDajrgg8Wkh4I"
user="feature"
#server="openscanfeedback.dnsuser.de:1312"
server="openscanfeedback.dnsuser.de"
port=str(1312)
pw_down="nnEDBxDrDPFPWKZIylxbL21U9QhUrnBWIqsnYUgmLPsCd1ZiJtClrS2bxc8wJq7DSIZNOoiWnMNrLnuJadNagCKhsDCyCVRiUBpf"
user_down="download"
target="/home/pi/shared2/log/"+key+".jpg"

os.system("sudo cp "+filepath+" "+target)

def check_terms():
    #if terms=="False":
    #    status("please agree to the terms of use")
    #    end()
    pass

def status(text):
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentstatus_rpi.log", "w") as file:
        file.write(text)
    msg['payload']=text
    pass

def onlinetest():
    if os.system("nc -w 1 "+server+" "+port)==0:
        status("server is online")
        
    else:
        status("server not reachable")
        end()
    pass

def upload():
    command="curl -k --user "+user+":"+pw+" sftp://"+server+":"+port+"/"+user+"/ -T "+target
    if os.system(command)!=0:
        status("upload failed")
        end()


def download():
    command="curl -k --user "+user_down+":"+pw_down+" sftp://"+server+":"+port+"/"+user_down+"/"+key+".jpg -o "+filepath
    test=os.system(command)
    return test

check_terms()
status("checking connection")
try:
    onlinetest()
except:
    status("connection failed")
    return msg

status("uploading file")
try:
    upload()
except:
    status("upload failed")
    return msg
sleep(delay/2)
status("waiting for file")
sleep(delay/2)

for x in range (repeats):
    if download()!=0:
        status("try: ("+str(x+1)+")")
        sleep(delay/2)
    else:
        os.system("sudo rm "+target)
        status("--READY--")
        return msg

status("--READY--")
return msg

name: Run Routine
func:
import RPi.GPIO as GPIO
import time
import picamera
from time import sleep
# Zip-packer
import os
import shutil
from os import path
from zipfile import ZipFile
from shutil import make_archive
from PIL import Image
import sys

from zipfile import ZipFile



with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentstatus_rpi.log", "r") as file:
    test=file.read()
if test!="no camera found" and test!="--READY--":
    return

#routine settings
fotosperrotation=msg['payload']['PhotosPerRotation']
startdeflection=msg['payload']['StartDeflection']
verticalpositions=msg['payload']['VerticalPositions']
projectname=msg['payload']['Projectname']

# cam settings
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/camera_resolution_x.log", "r") as file:
    resx=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/camera_resolution_y.log", "r") as file:
    resy=int(file.read())


with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_rotor_dir.log", "r") as file:
    dirpinrotor=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_rotor_step.log", "r") as file:
    steppinrotor=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_turntable_dir.log", "r") as file:
    dirpintt=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/pin_turntable_step.log", "r") as file:
    steppintt=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_stepsperrotation.log", "r") as file:
    rotorspr=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_stepsperrotation.log", "r") as file:
    ttspr=int(file.read())  
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_delay.log", "r") as file:
    delayrotor=float(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_delay.log", "r") as file:
    delaytt=float(file.read())    
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_accramp.log", "r") as file:
    ttramp=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/turntable_acc.log", "r") as file:
    ttacc=ttramp*float(file.read())   
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_accramp.log", "r") as file:
    rotorramp=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/rotor_acc.log", "r") as file:
    rotoracc=rotorramp*float(file.read())   

startangle = rotorspr/360*startdeflection
projectcode =time.strftime("20%y-%m-%d %H.%M.%S - ")+projectname+'/'
dirname='./shared2/'+projectcode
os.makedirs(dirname)  

GPIO.setwarnings(False)
GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
GPIO.setup(3, GPIO.OUT)



def ttrun(step_count):
    stoptest()
    GPIO.setup(dirpintt, GPIO.OUT)
    GPIO.setup(steppintt, GPIO.OUT)
    if (step_count>0):
        GPIO.output(dirpintt, GPIO.HIGH)
    if(step_count<0):
        GPIO.output(dirpintt, GPIO.LOW)
        step_count=-step_count
    for x in range(step_count):
        GPIO.output(steppintt, GPIO.HIGH)
        if x<=ttramp and x<=step_count/2:
            delay=delaytt+(ttramp-x)*delaytt/ttacc
        elif step_count-x<=ttramp and x>step_count/2:
            delay=delaytt+(ttramp-step_count+x)*delaytt/ttacc
        sleep(delay)
        GPIO.output(steppintt, GPIO.LOW)
        sleep(delay)

def rotorrun(step_count):
    stoptest()
    GPIO.setup(dirpinrotor, GPIO.OUT)
    GPIO.setup(steppinrotor, GPIO.OUT)
    if (step_count>0):
        GPIO.output(dirpinrotor, GPIO.HIGH)
    if(step_count<0):
        GPIO.output(dirpinrotor, GPIO.LOW)
        step_count=-step_count
    for x in range(step_count):
        GPIO.output(steppinrotor, GPIO.HIGH)
        if x<=rotorramp and x<=step_count/2:
            delay=delayrotor+(rotorramp-x)*delayrotor/rotoracc
        elif step_count-x<=rotorramp and x>step_count/2:
            delay=delayrotor+(rotorramp-step_count+x)*delayrotor/rotoracc
        sleep(delay)
        GPIO.output(steppinrotor, GPIO.LOW)
        sleep(delay)

def updatepreview():
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/updatepreview.log", "w") as file:
        file.write(time.strftime("20%y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S"))

def stoptest():
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/stopstate.log", "r") as file:
        if (file.read()!="stop"):
            return
    saveparameters()
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/stopstate.log", "w") as file:
        file.write("ready")
    stoppp() # let it run into an error ;)
    
    
def takephoto():
    stoptest()
    with picamera.PiCamera() as camera:
        with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/shutterspeed.log", "r") as file:
            shutterspeed=int(file.read())*100
        camera.iso = 100
        camera.brightness = 50
        camera.contrast = 0
        camera.resolution=(resx, resy)
        camera.exposure_compensation = 0 
        timestamp= time.strftime("20%y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S")
        filepath = dirname+'/'+ timestamp + ".jpg"
        sleep(0.7)
        camera.awb_mode = 'auto'
        camera.exposure_mode = 'off'
        camera.shutter_speed = shutterspeed
        camera.capture(filepath, quality=100)
        
        crop(filepath)
        zip(filepath)
        camera.close()
    updatepreview()

def turntablerotation():
    for x in range (fotosperrotation):
        with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentstatus_rpi.log", "w") as file:
            file.write("Position: "+str(vertpos)+"/"+str(verticalpositions)+" Foto: "+str(x+1)+"/"+str(fotosperrotation))
        if fotosperrotation!=1:
            ttrun(ttspr/fotosperrotation)
        takephoto()

def saveparameters():
    os.mknod(dirname+"/parameters.txt")

    cameracontrast=0
    camerabrightness=50
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/shutterspeed.log", "r") as file:
        shutterspeed=int(file.read())
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/cropx.log", "r") as file:
        cropx=int(file.read())
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/cropy.log", "r") as file:
        cropy=int(file.read())

    with open(dirname+"/parameters.txt", "w") as file:
        file.write("Settings for OpenScanPi;\n")
        file.write("projectname;"+str(projectname)+"\n")
        file.write("fotosperrotation;"+str(fotosperrotation)+"\n")
        file.write("startdeflection;"+str(startdeflection)+"\n")
        file.write("verticalpositions;"+str(verticalpositions)+"\n")
        file.write("shutterspeed;"+str(shutterspeed)+"\n")
        file.write("cropx;"+str(cropx)+"\n")
        file.write("cropy;"+str(cropy)+"\n")

    zip(dirname+"/parameters.txt")

    shutil.move('shared2/temp.zip','shared2/ui/data/zip/'+projectcode[:-1]+'.zip')
    shutil.rmtree(dirname)
    
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentstatus_rpi.log", "w") as file:
        file.write("--READY--")

def zip(filepath):
    with ZipFile("/home/pi/shared2/temp.zip", "a") as zip:
        zip.write(filepath, os.path.basename(filepath))
    os.remove(filepath)
    
def crop(filepath):
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/cropx.log", "r") as file:
        cropx=int(file.read())
    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/cropy.log", "r") as file:
        cropy=int(file.read())    
    img = Image.open(filepath)
    width, height = img.size 

    left = width*cropy/100
    top = height*cropx/100
    right = width*(100-cropy)/100
    bottom = height*(100-cropx)/100
    img= img.crop((left,top,right,bottom))
    img  = img.transpose(Image.ROTATE_90)
    img.save(filepath)
    img  = img.transpose(Image.ROTATE_270)
    zoom=min(float(cropx)/50,float(cropy)/50)
    img = img.resize((int(float(1200-24*cropy)/(1-zoom)),int(float(900-18*cropx)/(1-zoom))))
    img  = img.transpose(Image.ROTATE_90)
    img.save('./shared2/ui/data/preview.jpg')
    img.close()


rotorrun(-startangle)
for x in range (verticalpositions-1):
    vertpos = x+1
    turntablerotation()
    if (verticalpositions>1):
        rotorrun(2*startangle/(verticalpositions-1))
if (verticalpositions==1):
    startangle=-startangle
vertpos=verticalpositions
turntablerotation()

rotorrun(-startangle)

saveparameters()

return msg

msg.payload=global.get("newpreview")
return msg;

with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/updatepreview.log", "r") as file:
    newpreview=file.read()

if msg['payload']==newpreview:
    return
msg['payload']=newpreview
return msg

name: Compare Versions
func:
import os


file = '/home/pi/.node-red/flows_raspberrypi.json'
url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OpenScanEu/OpenScan/master/update.json'
try:
    os.remove(file)
except OSError:
    pass
os.system('wget -O'+file+' '+url+' >/dev/null 2>&1')


with open("/home/pi/shared2/ui/data/update.log", "r") as file:
    versionserver=str(file.read())[:16]
with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentversion.log", "r") as file:
    versionpi=str(file.read())[:16]

msg['payload']="you are up to date"

if versionpi!=versionserver:
    file="/home/pi/.node-red/flows_raspberrypi_download.json"
    url="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OpenScanEu/OpenScan/master/update_mini.json"
    try:
        os.remove(file)
    except OSError:
        pass
    os.system('wget -O'+file+' '+url+' >/dev/null 2>&1')

    with open("/home/pi/shared2/log/currentserverversion.log", "w") as file:
        file.write(versionserver)
    os.rename("/home/pi/.node-red/flows_raspberrypi_download.json","/home/pi/shared2/ui/data/old_flows/"+versionserver+".json")
    msg['payload']="new updates available"

return msg
